mapper.select: SELECT pool.ID id, pool.AVAILABLE_NUM availableNum, pool.EXPIRY_DATE expiryDate, prd.VALUE productValue, pr.ID grantProgramId FROM APP_PBE.GRANT_PROGRAMS pr LEFT JOIN APP_PBE.GRANT_PROGRAM_PARAMS prm ON ( prm.GRANT_PROGRAM_ID = pr.ID AND NVL(prm.DATE_FROM, SYSDATE) <= SYSDATE AND NVL(prm.DATE_TO,SYSDATE) >= SYSDATE AND prm.PARAM_ID = 'EX_POL_DAY' ) JOIN APP_PBE.ORDERS ord ON ord.GRANT_PROGRAM_ID = pr.ID JOIN APP_PBE.PBE_PRODUCT_INSTANCE_POOLS pool ON pool.ORDER_ID = ord.ID JOIN APP_PBE.PBE_PRODUCTS prd ON prd.PRD_ID = pool.PRD_ID WHERE TRUNC(pool.EXPIRY_DATE + NVL(prm.VALUE, #{criteria.config.defaultDaysNumberAfterEndDateToExpiryPool})) <= TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND pool.AVAILABLE_NUM > 0

SELECT pool.ID id, ord.ID orderId, pool.ALL_NUM allNum, pool.AVAILABLE_NUM availableNum, pool.RESERVED_NUM reservedNum, pool.USED_NUM usedNum, pool.REMBURS_NUM reimbursedNum, pool.EXPIRED_NUM expiredNum, pool.RETURNED_NUM returnedNum, pool.START_DATE startDate, pool.EXPIRY_DATE expiryDate, ord.GRANT_PROGRAM_ID grantProgramId, ord.EXTERNAL_ORDER_ID externalOrderId, prd.VALUE productValue FROM APP_PBE.CONTRACTS cnt JOIN APP_PBE.ORDERS ord on ord.CONTRACT_ID = cnt.ID JOIN APP_PBE.PBE_PRODUCT_INSTANCE_POOLS pool on pool.ORDER_ID = ord.ID JOIN APP_PBE.PBE_PRODUCTS prd ON prd.PRD_ID = pool.PRD_ID WHERE cnt.ID = #{contractId}
